# supportIndirectCommandBuffers

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the render pipeline supports encoding commands into an indirect command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportIndirectCommandBuffers: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property gets its value by copying from the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor/supportIndirectCommandBuffers] property of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor] instance as the GPU device creates the pipeline state.
title: supportIndirectCommandBuffers
